option1: Questions 91 really funny would you rather questions story by kyle boureston published october 12, 2017 updated june 4, 2025 share this article share options share a link that only beer connoisseur subscribers can access leave your comment 3 comments 3 leave a reply cancel reply your email address will not be published. required fields are marked comment name email save my name, email, and website in this browser for the next time i comment. all sort by newest oldest no readers' pick yet. sort by newest oldest anonymous says march 1, 2021 at 1140 pm 4.5 reply anonymous says february 12, 2019 at 1244 am 5 reply anonymous says october 20, 2018 at 743 am 4 reply unsplash phil coffman funny would you rather questions are a blast to ask. they can turn any conversation into a hilarious and ridiculous exchange. theyre questions to ask when youre sitting around a table with friends, one on one with a girl you like,
option2: Bored at school, in between classes. traditionally, theyre questions with two different choices , both equally challenging to decide on. now ive played the game two ways the first, you cant change anything . what you answer is what you get and you cant get surgery or an exterminator or do any sort of action to change the outcome of your answer or to fix what you decide on. nothing can change. the second, you can ask questions before you decide . the question master makes up the rules. check out scott aukermans podcast, comedy bang bang! for an idea of how the rules work. its a fun way to play if you have a creative and quick-witted mind. of course, you dont have to stick to these methods and can make as many changes as you want! with this list, well be sticking with funny questions to ask while playing would you rather . ive separated the list into sections to make it more accessible. feel free to skip around or read it all the way through. youre bound to find a few funny would you rather questions to bring about a silly time. contents the best conversation starters for a girl for couples to know someone clean funny dares hard and funny 13 best funny would you rather questions unsplash omar lopez the best of the best. these would you rather questions are hard to answer, but are guaranteed to make people smile. 1. would you rather give up breakfast, lunch, or dinner

option1: Questions are a blast to ask. they can turn any conversation into a hilarious and ridiculous exchange. theyre questions to ask when youre sitting around a table with friends, one on one with a girl you like,
option2: Bored at school, in between classes. traditionally, theyre questions with two different choices , both equally challenging to decide on. now ive played the game two ways the first, you cant change anything . what you answer is what you get and you cant get surgery or an exterminator or do any sort of action to change the outcome of your answer or to fix what you decide on. nothing can change. the second, you can ask questions before you decide . the question master makes up the rules. check out scott aukermans podcast, comedy bang bang! for an idea of how the rules work. its a fun way to play if you have a creative and quick-witted mind. of course, you dont have to stick to these methods and can make as many changes as you want! with this list, well be sticking with funny questions to ask while playing would you rather . ive separated the list into sections to make it more accessible. feel free to skip around or read it all the way through. youre bound to find a few funny would you rather questions to bring about a silly time. contents the best conversation starters for a girl for couples to know someone clean funny dares hard and funny 13 best funny would you rather questions unsplash omar lopez the best of the best. these would you rather questions are hard to answer, but are guaranteed to make people smile. 1. would you rather give up breakfast, lunch, or dinner
